adDetails: Vassar College senior just returning from a semester in Paris, available to tutor your children. Fluent French speaker with extensive experience working with kids, including Vassar day care, summer camp counselor, and Girl Scout leader. Lessons targeted to individual's needs, including conversation, accent coaching, writing, vocabulary and grammar. Clients include beginning students, preparation for travel, and high school students seeking help with paper writing and exam preparation. References available. $20/hr.
